title: GXBank on cybersecurity, scams and AI: What really happens behind the scenes to protect users
description: GXBank recently marked its second anniversary with more than one million Malaysians onboard, cementing its position as the country’s first and largest digital bank. Built as a cloud-native banking platform from day one, GXBank has scaled rapidly without the c…
